Description:
Privacy with views on 2825m2
Set back on the block for privacy, this lovely 2 bedroom home makes an ideal permanent residence or holiday home to escape the rat race. With extensive established gardens, the property takes advantage of the northern sunshine. A good sized undercover decked area for entertaining at the rear, spa area an added bonus. Veranda on all sides with sunblinds all round, allows you to take in pleasant country views over the well established gardens. The sloping block allows for excellent under house storage. Features include new bamboo flooring throughout the home, exposed beams in living room, lpg log heating & split system as well as ceiling fans. Good supply of shedding includes a huge 4 car powered garage with roller doors to separate half way. Ideal for those in need of a studio or the like and a huge 4 car carport. Situated in a quiet location combined with privacy within walking distance to historic town centre, this one is too good to miss.
Inspection by appointment.
For more information please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908
Insights: 9 Lathlain Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2018 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Superb 34 HA with views for miles
With Picturesque views and superb setting, this appealing parcel of land of approx. 34Ha (85 Acres). Zoned farming with superb district views the property is of grazing land with Tourello creek running through the rear this offers a great opportunity to acquire an ideal hobby block for those seeking a lifestyle change. and set within easy reach of historic Clunes township the site of book town and Wesley college campus, this is one opportunity one would not like to miss.
Insights: 95 Slaughteryard Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
3.6 acre Lifestyle Block in Historic Township of Clunes
A fully fenced 3.68 Acre (1.49 Ha) property only minutes drive from the picturesque township of Clunes.
Only 30 minutes away from Victorias largest inland city of Ballarat.
This unique lifestyle block is flat with a small grove of Gum trees 23m from the front boundary. Fully fenced, with access to town water supply.

Description:
'Crompton House' circa 1910
Discover the enchanting 'Crompton House' amidst beautiful gardens, set on approximately 1769sqm in historic Clunes only 90 mins from Melbourne.
This fabulous home offers stunning period features beyond the privacy of the hedged frontage and ornate stone walls. Leadlight doors, original chimneys, 12ft ceilings and polished timber floors feature, along with the 1.8m wide hall and 2.3m round cellar.
Three large bedrooms include a 6x4 master with romantic open fire place, also add a 4th bedroom, study or office. The stylish country kitchen opens into large 8x4 lounge /dining which opens onto side veranda. Solid fuel heating keeps you cosy during the winter months with the split system for year round comfort. The modern family bathroom and extra bathroom facilities combined with the laundry are an added convenience.
Outside a studio/workshop/home office & 6 car open bay carport
Potential for subdivision STCA for added value
Currently listed on Dayget for the B&B market
Inspection for the serious buyer encouraged
For more information please contact: Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908
Insights: 31 Talbot Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
The perfect Country Getaway
Situated in the picturesque township of Clunes, only 90 minutes from Melbourne and an easy drive to Daylesford and Ballarat, this charming near new rendered brick cottage on 1.5 acres, with a 5 star energy rating and double glazed windows all round, would make the ideal country getaway or 1st home buyer's chance to get into the market. Consisting of 2 bedrooms, an open plan north facing living/dining room, a brand new wood fire heater, polished timber floorboards, a unique galley style kitchen with gas cooking and brand new appliances, and a marble tiled bathroom with a bath - and incorporating a laundry. Externally there is a huge private deck enclosed by a Tuscan style rendered wall - this is a great entertaining area. There is a double carport, and two large sheds great for use as storage, workshop or Art studio.
Insights: 75 Foulkes Crescent, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2018 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
"Phillips Lodge"
Circa 1879, and set on approximately 989sqm, this beautifully renovated 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom period home has it all.
Features include 12ft ceilings, bay window in lounge with polished timber floors though out, stylish kitchen with island bench & dishwasher which opens into separate dining room with wood heating for cosy comfort during the winter months. Well insulated in ceiling & walls. Bathroom features claw foot bath and separate shower. Outside a 14m x 5m shed with roller door & 2 car carport. Easy access to train station with potential for B&B. Perfect for a weekend getaway or make it your permanent home. Opposite Health Service and in walking distance to heart of the township
Insights: 75 Service Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Lovely 3 Bedroom Home on 1/2 an acre
For more than meets the eye, this well presented 3 bedroom home is set on a huge block of 2254m2 with potential to subdivide (STCA)
This home has laminated timber floors with carpet to living & bedrooms.
Includes a light & bright kitchen feature with part glass ceiling & 900mm gas cooking. Split system and a well placed free standing wood heater to keep you cosy in the living area.
Bathroom features corner spa with separate shower and plenty of storage
The huge rear undercover decking area is a bonus for year round entertaining.
Excellent shedding includes 2 x dbl lock up garages as well as a triple carport providing off street under cover parking for 6 vehicles
Close to primary school and a pleasant walk to shops & cafes,. All this and more. A must to inspect!
Insights: 41 Leslie Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017 and 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Breathtaking views on 2.8 acres
Sit back, relax and watch the sun set from this lovely low maintenance country home. Includes 2 bedrooms with en-suite to Master and walk-in robe. The large living area has potential to create a 3rd bedroom if required. Second bathroom incorporates laundry with rear decking access. Great family kitchen/dining. Veranda to front and rear for year round enjoyment. Lovely, low maintenance garden with blooms for all seasons, tank water with option available to connect to town water or install bore. Double carport plus storage and some extra shedding at rear. Only 2 minutes drive to Clunes township or 20 mins drive to Ballarat. All that you need in a country retreat. This property is a must to inspect.
Please contact:
Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908

Description:
7 Acres close to town
Build your lifestyle property (STCA) while you relax and watch the native wildlife graze. This property includes an Acorn and 2 fruit baring Pear trees along with a scattering of Gums. Located only a few minutes drive from the heart of Clunes and all it has to offer. Water connected. Power and phone available.
Only 25 mins drive to Ballarat or Maryborough. Inspect today!
For more information: Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908
Insights: 3660 Ballarat-Maryborough Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
20 acres within 5 minutes drive of town centre.
Zoned Rural Living this 20 acre block is waiting for you to create your own idea of country living. Quiet location with valid Planning Permit until April 2018. Majority of block is cleared however a number of Gum Trees to the rear. Divided into 5 paddocks with winter creek running through the property. Includes 2 bores for water supply. Power, & telephone close by.
For more information please contact Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908 Jo Millar on 0438 081 301
Insights: 90 Beckworth Court Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
3 Bedroom Home with great investment potential
If you're looking for a project, this larger than meets the eye, vinyl clad, 3 bedroom home is a renovators delight. This home sits on a 1125m2 parcel of land with country views. Good potential for a perfect country holiday stay, investment or your own home.
Features include:
3 good sized bedrooms
Large kitchen with upright Westinghouse electric stove & range hood
LPG heating
Mitsubishi electric Split System
Powered workshop approx (6x10)with roller door
Double carport
Concrete ramp to entry
Please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 for more information

Description:
Solid 2 bedroom home on 1148m2
For more than meets the eye, this steel framed, brick veneer home has good sized rooms on a good sized block. Ideal investment property or easy care home with extension potential (STCA).
Featuring:
Slab floor heating plus Split system
Electric oven/lpg cook top
Built in robes
Fully enclosed back yard
Circular drive
Large single carport
Single lock up garage
Veranda to rear
Mount Beckworth views
To arrange inspection please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456908
